TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit WebRequestEvent extends System.Web.Management.WebManagementEvent

summary.span: 定義提供 Web 要求資訊之事件的基底類別。

span.span: Defines the base class for events providing Web-request information.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在每個 Web 要求時引發。The is raised at every Web request. 它會使用類別來取得要求的資訊。It uses the class to obtain request information. > [!NOTE] > 在大部分情況下，您會使用標準的 ASP.NET 健康監視類型和設定來控制其行為`healthMonitoring`組態區段。In most cases you will use the standard ASP.NET health-monitoring types and control their behavior by setting the `healthMonitoring` configuration section. 下一個範例所示，您也可以建立自訂的型別。You can also create custom types, as shown in the next example. 如果您建立自訂的事件類型，而且您需要新增您自己的資訊，請自訂方法。If you create your custom event type and you need to add your own information, customize the method. 這可避免覆寫或竄改機密的系統資訊。This will avoid overwriting or tampering with sensitive system information. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何衍生自類別來建立自訂的事件。The following code example shows how to derive from the class to create a custom event. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Management.WebRequestEvent#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Management.WebRequestEvent/CS/WebRequestEvent.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Management.WebRequestEvent#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Management.WebRequestEvent/VB/WebRequestEvent.vb#1)] 以下是摘錄自組態檔可讓 ASP.NET 使用自訂的事件。The following is an excerpt of the configuration file that enables ASP.NET to use the custom event. ``` ```

summary.span: 取得與 Web 應用程式要求相關的資訊。

span.span: Gets the information associated with the Web-application request.

value.span: 與 Web 應用程式要求關聯的資訊。

span.span: The information associated with the Web-application request.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 標準要求資訊由定義類別。The standard request information is defined by the class. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何取得 Web 要求的資訊。The following code example shows how to obtain the Web-request information.
